price: Para malaikat itu berkata, "Apakah kamu merasa heran tentang ketetapan Allah? (Itu adalah) rahmat Allah dan keberkatan-Nya dicurahkan atas kamu, hai ahlulbait! Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Terpuji lagi Maha Pemurah".
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۖ رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū ataʿjabīna min amri al-lahi raḥmatu al-lahi wabarakātuhu ʿalaykum ahla al-bayti innahu ḥamīdun majīdun
